children.text: The top of the floor slab has been cut/chased, which would have either exposed or cut away the steel reinforcement mesh from within it, compromising the slab’s integrity.

The builder must have the original design engineer inspect and make recommendations on the acceptability of these cuts to ensure the slab’s long-term performance. The owner should request a copy of the engineer’s comments and/or recommendations and ensure that any rectification work is carried out under the supervision and approval of the building surveyor.
